heading: Tonight
text: Periods of clearing. Snow showers becoming more scattered overnight. Lows in the 20s, a few teens in the northeast. Light and variable wind.

heading: Sunday
text: Periods of clouds, with a chance of a few scattered snow showers. Highs from the mid 20s in the north, increasing into the low 30s in the south. Southwest wind at 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Sunday Night
text: Periods of clouds, with a chance of a stray snow shower. Much cooler. Lows near 10 north, in the teens south. Calm Wind.
